org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.util

Class RemoteSchemaLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.util.SchemaLoader
      • org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.util.RemoteSchemaLoader

  • public class RemoteSchemaLoader
extends SchemaLoader
    Class used to retrieve the schema from the schema files.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.util.SchemaLoader

        matchingRulesToKeep, syntaxesToKeep

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RemoteSchemaLoader()
      In remote mode we cannot load the matching rules and syntaxes from local configuration, so we should instead bootstrap them from the SDK's core schema.

        public RemoteSchemaLoader()

    • Method Detail

      • readSchema

        public Schema readSchema(ConnectionWrapper connWrapper)
                  throws LdapException,
                         DirectoryException,
                         InitializationException,
                         ConfigException
        Reads and returns the schema.
        Parameters:
        connWrapper - the connection to be used to load the schema.
        Returns:
        the schema
        Throws:
        LdapException - if an error occurs reading the schema.
        DirectoryException - if an error occurs parsing the schema.
        InitializationException - if an error occurs finding the base schema.
        ConfigException - if an error occurs loading the configuration required to use the schema classes.

      • getSchema

        public Schema getSchema()
        Returns the schema that was read.
        Overrides:
        getSchema in class SchemaLoader
        Returns:
        the schema that was read.
